titlepage.titleproper: Register of the John R. Chaisson Papers, 1940-1975.
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, diaries, appointment books, speeches and writings, notes, reports, memoranda, oral history transcript, sound recordings, photographs, and printed matter, relating to manpower and budgetary requirements of the U.S. Marine Corps, the Vietnamese Conflict, and U.S. Marine Corps activities during World War II, in China during 1948-1949, in Korea during 1953-1954, and in Vietnam during 1966-1968.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], John R. Chaisson Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1973.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Chief of Staff, U.S. Marine Corps

scopecontent.p: Letters from John R. Chaisson to his parents, arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: Letters to Mrs. John R. Chaisson, 1948-1968.

scopecontent.p: Letters from John R. Chaisson to his wife, arranged chronologically.
Diaries and appointment books, arranged chronologically.
Addresses, research paper, review, clippings, and notes, arranged as listed.

did.unittitle: Address at Maxwell Air Force Base, concerning the post-war condition of armed services, January 21, 1971
Address entitled "Opportunities for Young People in Government."
Review of a manuscript entitled "Manning the Ramparts," concerning manpower functions in the U.S. Department of Defense

"The Role of the Assistant Division Commander in Order to Determine his Most Effective Employment in the Command and Control of a Marine Division," student research project, Marine Corps Schools, Quantico, Virginia, March 1958
Clippings on appearances, speeches, and statements of John R. Chaisson

scopecontent.p: Reports, memoranda, lists, clippings, memorabilia, printed matter, and other material, arranged alphabetically by subject.

CBS News special report, "Where We Stand in Vietnam."

"Annotated Bibliography on Systems Cost Analysis," by P. A. DonVito
"Area Security," by F. J. West, Jr.

"Process of Military Learning and Adaptation, Three Case Studies of Counterforce by Small Units," by F. J. West, Jr.
"Systems Analysis and Policy Planning Application in Defense," by E. S. Quade and W. I. Boucher

"Tabular Method for Comparing Friendly and Enemy Casualties: A Case Study of Marine Mortalities Resulting from Patrols and Six Offensive Operations in Quang Nam Province," M. E. Arnsten and F. J. West, Jr.
"Techniques of Systems Analysis," by H. Kahn and I. Mann
"U.S. Fatalities during Vietnamization," by F. J. West, Jr.
"U. S. Fatalities during Vietnamization," Part II, by C. Morris and F. J. West, Jr.

Coverage of military personnel in I Corps
Strategy and significant details of operational situation, 1967
U.S. Marine Corps in Vietnam, summary
Expression of gratitude to Major J. R. Chaisson for evacuation, December 1948
Station list, Fleet Marine Force, Western Pacific, 1949
Summary of report to Secretary James Forrestal by Admiral King, 1945
Unification of the War and Navy Departments, summary of report, 1945
Budgetary requirements, 1969, interview with James R. Schlesinger

scopecontent.p: Transcript of an oral history interview with Lieutenant General John R. Chaisson, USMC, by the History and Museums Division of the U.S. Marine Corps, 1975.

did.unittitle: Transcript of an oral history interview with Lieutenant General John R. Chaisson, USMC, by the History and Museums Division of the U.S. Marine Corps, 1975

scopecontent.p: Photographs, 9 envelopes (280 prints). See also Appendix A, list of sound recordings (tapes)

did.unittitle: 51 photos of Gen. Chaisson and others in Vietnam,
80 Photos of Gen. Chaisson at social and official functions, award presentations and inspections,
45 photos of J.R. Chaisson and others during World War II and Korean War
10 photos of Gen. Chaisson with important persons, including Gen. William Westmoreland, Amb. Ellsworth Bunker, and J. B. Connally,
28 photos of a landing exercise by the 2nd Marine Division
35 photos of J. R. Chaisson and friends near Tsingtao, China,
5 photos of the landing at Peleliu Island, Philippines,
